name: web_mcp
description: Enhanced Web MCP Server - Provides web search, URL fetching, and content processing capabilities

tools.name: brave_search_web
tools.description: Enhanced web search using Brave Search with language support and metadata (web scraping). Returns formatted HTML results.

tools.name: brave_search_api
tools.description: Enhanced web search using Brave Search API with structured results. Returns formatted JSON results including web results, news, videos, discussions, infobox, FAQ, and locations. Supports both GET and POST methods.

tools.name: google_search_api
tools.description: Google Search API using SerpAPI. Returns formatted results including organic results, answer box, knowledge graph, people also ask, related searches, top stories, and local results.

tools.name: fetch_url
tools.description: Enhanced web reader that fetches and processes web content with pagination, caching, and content filtering. Supports auto-detection of response type (json/html/text).

tools.name: post_url
tools.description: Sends an HTTP POST request to the specified URL with optional data and headers. Supports JSON payloads and returns the response as text.
